subject: Preakness Stakes
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Mike Smith, who will ride Mine That Bird in the Preakness Stakes on Saturday, is a Hall of Famer who won the Kentucky Derby in 2005 and the Preakness in 1993.
snippet: Mike Smith, who will ride Mine That Bird in the Preakness Stakes on Saturday, is a Hall of Famer who won the Kentucky Derby in 2005 and the Preakness in 1993.
